title.narrative: Sustainable Power Sector Development Program (Program Loan)

description.narrative: The Program aims to promote sustained economic growth by providing further support and incentives to the Government for continued power sector reform activities through financial and organizational restructuring, improved sector governance, promotion of private sector participation, and capacity development.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President
Output indicators are in the Completion Report - Design and Monitoring Framework: https://www.adb.org/sites/default/files/project-document/197476/36107-013-pcr.pdf
